participant_1.background:
I'm not sure how to tell my parents that I've been seeing a therapist, but I know it's something I need to do.
I went to the opera and got a new hair dye while on vacation.
My parents are not supportive of my singing because they want me to have a stable career.
I spend most of my time out with friends, so I don't get to see my family as much as I'd like.
my favorite singer is taylor swift.

participant_2.background:
I spent my last birthday with my grandchildren and we had a lot of fun.
i love 80s music.
I started writing and recording blues music in my spare time.
I keep fit by weeding and doing yard work in my garden.
I like to read books and watch documentaries to expand my knowledge.

content.text: Hi! I love to go to the opera and get my hair dyed. What are your hobbies?
Hi there! My favorite hobby is writing and recording blues music. 80s music is my favorite, too!
Oh that's awesome! I wish I could sing. I love Taylor Swift.
She's great! I love her new song.
I'm not sure how to tell my parents that I've been seeing a therapist. They're not supportive of my singing, but I know it's something I need to do.
I'm sorry to hear that. I'm sure they'll understand eventually. What kind of music do you like to sing?
I love to sing country music. I went to the opera on vacation and got a new hair dye. I usually spend most of my time out with friends, so I don't get to see my family as much as I'd like.
Sounds like you have a busy life! I like to spend my time reading books and watching documentaries to expand my knowledge. I also keep fit by weeding and doing yard work in my garden.
That's cool! I love to read books, too. I'm trying to read more nonfiction so I can learn new things.
That's a great goal! I'm always learning new things by reading and watching documentaries.
Me too! It's so much fun to learn new things
